title: S15 Ep87: Return of the Ghost Writer
itunes:title: Return of the Ghost Writer
description:
Darkness Radio welcomes the Return of the Ghost Writer with guests Bill Murphy & John Huckert

This has been one of the most fascinating ghost cases ever documented, a case so powerful it has been witnessed by many with photographic evidence from skeptics and believers alike. Never before had such a startling account taken place. Ghostly images begin to emerge in Polaroid photographs taken in a quaint California home, images populated with written words and ghost like entities making themselves known.

Get the book here: https://www.ghostpolaroids.com

Visit Bill here: http://www.ghosttown.tv/

See the Come Play trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LQwiqhdMQ7g
